column2: scat2 <- ggscatter(iris, x = "Petal.Length", y="Petal.Width", shape = "Species", color = "Species", palette = "lancet", size = 2, alpha = 0.6) + stat_smooth(method=lm, se=FALSE, colour="black")
ydens2 <- ggdensity(iris, "Petal.Width", colour = "Species", fill = "Species", palette = "lancet") + rotate()
ggarrange(xdens2, NULL, scat2, ydens2, nrow = 2, ncol = 2, align = "hv", widths = c(2,1), heights = c(1,2), common.legend = TRUE)
